questions.question: For a 4-bit parallel adder, if the carry-in is connected to a logical HIGH, the result is __________

answers.a: The same as if the carry-in is tied LOW since the least significant carry-in is ignored
answers.b: That carry-out will always be HIGH
answers.c: A one will be added to the final result

questions.question: Why XOR gate is called an inverter?

answers.c: It behaves like a NOT gate
answers.d: It behaves like a AND gate

questions.question: The inverter can be produced with how many NAND gates?
In serial addition, the addition is carried out __________

answers.d: All bits at the same time

questions.question: How many shift registers are used in a 4 bit serial adder?
A D flip-flop is used in a 4-bit serial adder, why?

answers.a: It is used to invert the input of the full adder
answers.b: It is used to store the output of the full adder
answers.c: It is used to store the carry output of the full adder
answers.d: It is used to store the sum output of the full adder
